description: Enterprise techniques used by FlawedGrace, ATT&CK software S0383 v1.0
name: FlawedGrace (S0383)

techniques.comment: FlawedGrace has used port 443 for C2 communications.
FlawedGrace uses a custom binary protocol for its C2 communications.
FlawedGrace encrypts its C2 configuration files with AES in CBC mode.
